mapper.select: SELECT cp.post_id AS postId, cp.title AS title, cp.subtitle AS subtitle, cp.content AS content, cp.views AS views, cp.created_at AS createdAt FROM community_post cp WHERE cp.post_type = 'BLOG' AND cp.is_visible = 1 ORDER BY cp.created_at DESC

SELECT cp.post_id AS postId, cp.title AS title, cp.subtitle AS subtitle, cp.content AS content, cp.views AS views, cp.created_at AS createdAt FROM community_post cp WHERE cp.post_id = #{postId} AND cp.post_type = 'BLOG' AND cp.is_visible = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE community_post SET views = COALESCE(views, 0) + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND post_type = 'BLOG' AND is_visible = 1
